attributes.action: Persuade Banks & Cash Machine point providers to have them dispense £5 & £10 notes instead of £10 & £20 notes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
More & more people have their wages & benefits paid directly into their bank accounts, and therefore have to get at their cash via a Cash Machine which only dispenses £10 & £20 notes.
This has caused an increasing problem for retailers (particularly small shops) getting stuck for small change, as an increasing number of people come in paying for something like a 30p packet of mints with a £20 note.
It's also apparently caused a problem for the Bank of England trying to get shot of a load of brand new £5 notes.
It also means having to take more out of your bank account than you might necessarily need, and can't get at it at all if you need just £5 and have less than £10 in your account at that particular time (especially if it's just a savings account, or you don't have an overdraft facility to play with).

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
